ygData.subject: Re: hello it me again Margaret!!! HEHEHE
ygData.msgSnippet: Which version of EQ did you install? The requrements go up with the expansions. Luclin is the big kicker, raising the level beyond any other game I know about.
ygData.messageBody:
Which version of EQ did you install? The requrements go up with the
expansions. Luclin is the big kicker, raising the level beyond any
other game I know about.

If you play only the original version while preparing to make
upgrades you can have considerable fun even on an old or weak system.

You will probably experience fewer frustrations that way than by
trying to play the full game on an inadequate system.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., "muaddib74447" <muaddib1974@s...> wrote:
> Hi,
> How is everyone doing tonight? I am having troble with playing
> EverQuest. I was a stupid A*&, I bought the game and I did not look
> at the requirements. And, my computer is not up to the task. I am
> going to have to up grade it to play it hardcore. I am loooking
> forward to playing on a normal bases. I am hoping reading all of
the
> posting that all of you make with pay off. I am a human paladin.
Any
> help or hints will be greatly appreciated! I am looking forward to
> meet people on there and make friends and alliances.
> David
